runs.comm: first ball is pitched up and that is pushed towards mid-off

a duck on birthday for Tamim Iqbal, loses his off stump as he looks to chop the ball towards point, the ball nips back just a touch, was too close to try cutting that one, and the noise levels have reduced quite a bit at the stadium
slides that down the leg side
moving away outside off and that's left alone
pitched up and that is worked past mid-on for a couple, first runs off the bat
beaten by the away movememnt here, squares up the batsman, superb start from Tanwir

two in the first over for Tanwir, Hong Kong fans will be ecstatic, as will Nepal fans, Sabbir Rehman doesn't last long, he's trapped lbw and this is a dream start for Hong Kong, it was a short of length ball angling in from outside off, strikes him in front of middle and that was going on take leg stump
Haseeb Amjad starts with a ball outside off, moving away as the batsmen lets it go
this one holds it line, pitching on a length just outside off, guided down towards third man for a single
just outside leg stump, takes the thigh pad as he misses the glance, that could so easily have gone on to take leg stump
short and well outside off, slapped behind point by Shakib
keeps it tight around off, played with soft hands by Anamul, sends the ball towards cover for a quick single
length ball outside off, driven past a diving mid-off for four, not the most athletic attempt by the fielder there, the first boundary of the innings sends the crowd wild
what a shot that is from Anamul, a short ball on leg stump, pulled away behind square leg for six, that's what this crowd wants to see
coming in towards off stump, Anamul follows that six with a textbook leave
angling in towards offstump, 121kph, solidly defended by Anamul
whipped towards deep midwicket for a couple
length ball outside off, pushed towards mid-on
Shakib uses his feet, skips down the track to push the ball towards mid-on for a single
sensational from Shakib, fierce flat hit over extra cover after shuffling down the track, races away for four, Shakib looking to attack everything here
Amjad drops it short, on leg stump, Shakib is cramped up a touch, doesn't prevent him from helping it past square leg for four more
looks to slog this one, not the most pretty shot, badly mistimed and the ball rolls towards mid-on
short of length ball outside off, guided towards deep backward point
short of length ball on off stump, defended down the track
almost sneaks through between bat and ball, inside-edge sends the ball rolling towards point
a full slower ball on middle and off, Shakib is advancing down the track almost every ball, this time he moves away from leg as well, has to reach out to get to the ball, jams it towards mid-off
terrific from Shakib, just gets a touch back and waits for the ball to arrive, then guides this slightly short ball past backward point for four
a slog this time from Shakib, towards midwicket for a single
a touch short once more, swatted away towards midwicket for one more
once again on the shorter side, once more it is slugged towards deep midwicket, again it is a single
slower ball, 108kph, on a length and heading for off, nudged towards square leg for a single
spin for the first time, Nadeem starts with a wide delivery that is chopped in front of point
fuller one, this time Shakib stays in the crease and drives to the leg side for a single, Bangladesh perhaps want to see whether there is any spin in the track
flighted delivery, very full, Anamul capitalises, plays it inside-out over cover for four, lovely stroke from Anamul
this time a boundary to wide long-on, another lofted hit to clear the infield, Anamul uses the bottom hand to drag that one wide

a hat-trick of boundaries for Bangladesh, another flighted one from Nadeem, pitched up, this is launched towards long-off, where it should have been stopped but a bad miss from the fielder there allows a boundary
bowled 'im! that's how you respond to being hit for fours, Anamul is walking back to the pavilion, he was looking to play through the off side once more, he inside-edges it and loses his stump
defended towards point
just outside off, steered down towards deep backward square leg
length ball just outside off, defended towards point
driven towards long-off for a single
down the leg side, Shakib looking to glance that one, he misses with the bat but it deflects off his pad past the keeper, who mimes taking off the bails in an attempt to fool the batsman
length ball on middle and leg, nudged behind square for a single, Afzal completes a satisfactory day with the ball
lovely delivery to start from Irfan, moving away just a touch outside off, 135kph, Mushfiqur fishes at that legcutter and is beaten
pushes this one past point for a single, it was just outside off from Irfan
Shakib once again skips down the track, moves away from leg as well, then thrashes the ball through cover for four
goes for a big swipe, he misses, the ball goes through to the keeper outside off
length ball outside off, 134kph, driven towards sweeper cover
short of a length ball on off stump, down to third man for four, not sure that was entirely intentional
short of length ball on middle stump from Nawaz, dabbed towards point, big moment for Nawaz, making his debut in front of a vocal crowd
Mushfiqur looks to chop this one but is beaten outside off
this time Mushfiqur connects, and connects really well, the ball gallops to the backward point boundary, Mushfiqur gets well back in the crease before he cuts
full ball on the stumps this time, Mushfiqur seemed to have scuffed his shot a bit but mid-off is in the circle, and the ball easily clears him to get another boundary
tapped to the off side for a quick single
full and well outside off, defended to the off side
length ball is defended towards midwicket for a single
length ball heading for off stump, defended to the leg side by Shakib
flighted and full outside off, chopped towards point
whipped towards deep midwicket this time
this time Mushfiqur paddles it fine, a chase there for the fielder, pulls it back well in time, two to Mushfiqur
short of length ball on off stump, nudged towards square leg for a single
full and just outside off, 135kph, worked towards sweeper cover for a single
there's a signature shot from Shakib, he moved way across his stumps  to take a length ball well outside off stump and scoops it over fine leg, top improvisation and the crowd loves it
looks to sweep towards square leg, the ball rolls towards point instead

the end of Shakib, someone has hit the mute button in Chittagong, Shakib connected very well as he slugged the ball to deep midwicket, unfortunately he picked out the man in the deep and his cameo is over
short of length ball on off stump, tucked towards square leg
dropped, a big miss there from the keeper, Mushfiqur looking to guide the ball towards third man, thin edge towards the keeper, who can't latch on to a low chance
tapped towards cover for a single
well outside off, pushed towards deep point
short of length ball well outside off, spinning away, steered towards backward point, where there's a diving stop

Mushfiqur is gone, Atkinson will be the most relieved man as his miss off the previous over doesn't cost Hong Kong much, Mushfiqur holes out to extra cover and he's furious with himself, Nepal will be overjoyed, that was a wide delivery that Mushfiqur wanted to power through the off side, top edge sends the ball soaring high instead
Mahmudullah carves that towards sweeper cover for a single
towards midwicket for one more to end the over
much too far outside off from Nadeem
short of length and just outside off, slapped in front of point
worked toward midwicket for a single
a full toss is driven towards long-off, should have been a single, but a poor miss from the fielder there allows a second
a low full toss, driven towards long-off, this time Irfan Ahmed makes no mistake fielding

he's bowled him, hasn't he? third umpire called to decide whether the ball deflected off the keeper's pads onto the stumps, Mahmudullah is clearly bowled, he was looking to work the ball through the off side, he misses and the ball hit the outside of off stump on its way to the keeper, Bangladesh are six down
thick edge sends the ball towards cover
spinning away after pitching well outside off, guided towards backward point
way down the leg side, keeper does well to get a glove on that one
another one, miles down the leg side

the change of ball has worked for Nizakat, he sends this well outside off stump, an outside edge for Reza as he looks to drive through the off, Atkinson needs a second chance before securing the ball, a duck for Reza, Bangladesh collapsing here, four wickets for 16 runs now

after one for Niazakat, after two horrendous wides down the leg side, he has two wickets in two balls, this time it is Abdur Razzak who gets a duck, thanks to an outstanding catch from Atkinson, this was a wide and full delivery, had to react quickly to pouch the edge, some  Bangladesh fans in the stands are praying for their team now, hands folded and tense
well outside off, just close enough to the stumps to not be a wide, left alone by the batsman, no hat-trick for Nizakat
Nadeem starts the over with a ball heading towards middle, defended to the off side
dropped, that would have been wicket No. 9, Nizakat does well to come in off the rope from deep point, had to take a low chance in front of him, but he can't latch on to it
bowled 'im, Bangladsh fans very nervous now, Rubel is bowled off his pads, and Bangladesh have lost their ninth in the 15th over, from 85 for 3 to 102 for 9, what a slide this has been for Bangladesh
solid defence off the front foot
a thick inside edge sends the ball behind square leg, there's a single to be taken but they decline it to ensure Nasir is on strike
Nasir launches this one over the bowler's head, doesn't have the power to bisect long-on and long-off
towards long-on for a single
short of length ball on off stump, nudged to square leg for a single
drops it very short, slugged towards sweeper cover
flighted length ball on off stump, defended off the front foot to the off side
full ball which Nasir can't get under, jams it towards mid-off
worked towards midwicket for a single now

Bangladesh all out in the 17th over, hara-kiri from their batsmen, really should be doing better than they have, the final wicket goes down to a terrific catch leaping forward from long-on to clasp a low chance, Nepal will be in dreamland, but will Hong Kong really go for the target in 12-odd overs? Won't they be happy just to take their time to chase down the target in the full 20 overs?
